mapper.select: SELECT P_IDX FROM CART WHERE P_IDX =#{pIdx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART (U_IDX, P_IDX, P_COUNT, CA_REGDATE) VALUES(#{uIdx}, #{pIdx}, #{pCount}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT C.CA_REGDATE, C.P_COUNT, P.P_IDX, P.P_NAME, P.P_PRICE, P.P_DESC, P.P_FEE, P.P_IMG FROM CART C, PRODUCT P WHERE C.P_IDX = P.P_IDX AND U_IDX =#{uIdx}
